results.name: Largest squarefree number dividing sum of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: ffi[x_] := Flatten[FactorInteger[x]] lf[x_] := Length[FactorInteger[x]] ba[x_] := Table[Part[ffi[x], 2*w-1], {w, 1, lf[x]}] cor[x_] := Apply[Times, ba[x]] Table[cor[DivisorSigma[1, w]], {w, 1, 100}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 19 2003
